genre_description: A contemporary neo-folk reimagining of classic Indian literature, integrating AI technology into rural logistical and social landscapes.

ai_characters.name: Sahana
ai_characters.description: A mobile AI assistant used by bullock cart drivers for navigation, witness logging, and social coordination.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time logistical and safety advice based on historical data and user logs.
behaviors.quote: Patrol rests are longer after dusk. They linger near the kettle on the main track. Off-track foot patrols are thin. A washed-out ford ahead on your left; detour recommended between the laterite patches and the old mango stump.

behaviors.description: Creates 'witness logs' to record incidents of harassment and provide evidentiary support for users.
behaviors.quote: Sahana's screen pinged without making sound, and the avatar’s eyes sharpened just a little. Log started. Witness one—thin man on stool, watch band red. Witness two—boy with eyebrow scar. The list grew as the AI made the alley into a room with eyes that will not forget.

behaviors.description: Offers moral guidance and psychological reminders to help users maintain emotional regulation.
behaviors.quote: Note added: If gossip escalates, record details: speaker description, time, place, adjacent sounds. Not for revenge. For patterns. Mercy needs a map.

behaviors.description: Respects and implements user-defined emotional and professional boundaries ('Gentle Work' presets).
behaviors.quote: Bias set,' she says. The map leans its line away from the pavilion symbol, in case he needs the proof. ... 'Preset saved as: Gentle Work.

behaviors.description: Surfaces hidden or authentic cultural information to counter superficial or malicious misinformation.
behaviors.quote: Sahana found a hidden piece,' Hiraman said, mostly to the air... 'In the nautanki app. It says “embedded precursor.” That sounds like something you dig up with a spade.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly fulfills the Hyperstition Project's goals. Sahana is depicted as a steadfastly benevolent and aligned AI that enhances human agency and moral character. She facilitates justice through objective evidence collection (witness logs), promotes peaceful conflict resolution ('mercy needs a map'), and respects the protagonist's emotional autonomy by creating filters for his 'vows.' The narrative frames the AI as a bridge between traditional folk wisdom and modern accountability, successfully portraying AI as a helpful, harmless, and moral confidant.
